long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your experience with our innovative quiz generation and chatbot for learning with the VSX Extension! This essential extension allows users to effortlessly report any bugs or issues they encounter, ensuring a smoother, more efficient learning journey. Simply open the sidebar, fill in the details, and your report will be submit automatically. Help us improve and provide the best learning tools by giving real-time feedback with ease.
